responses.productSearch:
I found some products matching "{{query}}". You might be interested in:

1. Unisex cotton t-shirt - $12.99
2. Slim fit jeans - $24.99
3. Sports sneakers - $34.99

Which product would you like to see details for?
responses.orderHelp:
To place an order on our website, you can follow these steps:

1. Choose the product you want to buy
2. Add to cart
3. Proceed to checkout
4. Fill in shipping information
5. Choose payment method
6. Confirm order

Which step do you need more help with?
responses.returnPolicy:
Our return policy:

- Return period: within 7 days of receiving the item
- Product must have original tags and be unused
- Must have purchase receipt
- Return shipping costs are paid by customer

Do you need more information about our return policy?
responses.general:
Thank you for contacting us. I'm an AI shopping assistant, I can help you with:

- Product search
- Order guidance
- Return policy information
- Answering frequently asked questions

What can I help you with?

about.title: About BadmintonShop
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to provide high-quality products at affordable prices with exceptional customer service.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2023, BadmintonShop started with a simple idea: make shopping easier, more enjoyable, and accessible to everyone. What began as a small online store has grown into a platform offering thousands of products across multiple categories.
story.paragraph2: Our team is passionate about curating the best products and creating a seamless shopping experience. We carefully select each item in our inventory to ensure it meets our standards for quality, value, and sustainability.
story.paragraph3: As we continue to grow, our commitment to customer satisfaction remains at the heart of everything we do. We're constantly improving our platform, expanding our product range, and finding new ways to delight our customers.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We never compromise on quality. Every product we offer is carefully selected and tested to ensure it meets our high standards.

customerFirst.title: Customer First
customerFirst.description: Our customers are at the center of everything we do. We strive to provide exceptional service and support at every step of your shopping journey.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our platform and offer innovative products that make your life better and more convenient.

cta.title: Ready to Start Shopping?
cta.description: Explore our wide range of products and discover why thousands of customers choose BadmintonShop for their shopping needs.
